properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 6:55PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock
and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River at Gainesville Lock and
Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Tombigbee River At Demopolis
Lock and Dam...

While water levels are gradually falling along the Tombigbee River basin at
Bevil Lock and Dam and Gainesville Lock and Dam, minor flood stage continues.
Water levels have remained steady at Demopolis as the river is currently
cresting at this location. A gradual fall in water levels should begin over the
weekend.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  6:15 PM Friday the stage was 76.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 68.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 76.8 feet by
after midnight tonight .  Additional rises may be possible
thereafter.
* Impact...At 77.0 feet...Flooding of numerous cabins and trailers
near the river can be expected.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning, or sooner if
conditions warrant.
